Inside Macintosh: Cyberdog Programmer's Kit / Part 3 - Cyberdog Reference
Chapter 7 - Classes and Methods / CyberItem

ShowInfoPart

Displays the Item Info window for this Cyberdog item.

void ShowInfoPart ();
DISCUSSION
This method should display the Item Info window for this Cyberdog item. The superclass implementation creates and opens a default Item Info window that displays the Cyberdog item's default display name and URL.
